CustomField.description: The payment reference for this Recurring Donation.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( npsp4hub__Custom_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , npsp4hub__Custom_Payment_Reference__c , IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( npsp4hub__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , npsp4hub__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c , npsp4hub__Generated_Payment_Reference__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The payment reference for this Recurring Payment.
CustomField.label: Final Payment Reference
